summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing a review of a real estate portfolio valued at $20 billion. The email indicates a business relationship between the two individuals, with a focus on financial matters.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as the sender of an email discussing a real estate portfolio with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the recipient of an email from Jes Staley regarding a review of a substantial real estate portfolio.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are engaged in a business discussion regarding a real estate portfolio.

keyFacts: The email was sent on July 22, 2009.
The subject of the email indicates a review of a $20 billion real estate portfolio.
Jes Staley is identified as the sender and Jeffrey Epstein as the recipient.
